cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'nope' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent secure data transmission setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the MAC log level to an invalid value will cause logging initialization failures and impair debugging capabilities.
du.explanation_zh: 將 MAC 日誌等級設定為無效值將導致日誌初始化失敗，並損害調試能力。
